name: Bullmq
tagline: http proxy + throttler + message/job queue based on nodejs bull
body: # bullmq deadsimple configurable http proxy + throttler + message/job queue based on nodejs bull. Perfect for: * loose coupled api/applications * api limiting * task queues * redirecting subdomains and ports for scalability
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
